description:
We use h5py and MovingPandas to show how to write simple Python
workflows to track the movement of NASA satellites and extract from
their measurements, fields that can be plot along the tracks and be used
to assess the performance of geophysics and atmospheric models. We focus
on the Ozone Monitoring Instrument (OMI) on board the Aura satellite.
title: Python Workflows to Extract and Plot Satellite Data Products along Tracks
